name: Flipdish Ordering System
author: Flipdish

sections.description:
The Flipdish WordPress plugin allows restaurants who use the WordPress platform to add the Flipdish online ordering system to their website using a nice and easy to use interface.

Customise your ordering system to a dark or light theme or remove the background colours entierly using the easy to use interface. Visit our website https://flipdish.com/ for further information or visit https://portal.flipdish.com/ to set up your account and start accepting orders.

Check out our help desk to learn more about our platform and additional integrations to take your business to the next level. You can also talk to our sales team to learn more about what we can offer and get you setup.

Localization

  • English (default) – always included

  • .pot file (flipdish_ordering.pot) for translators is also always included ðŸ™‚

  • Your translation? – Just send it in

Translations

  • English – default, always included

Our Customers

Flipdish allows my customers to go from address to order completion in a very few amount of clicks. Easy to edit and update menu items.

  • Shane Crilly – Base Pizza

Flipdish are the best partner for your takeaway. They helped me to increase total orders & also migrate customers away from costly third party portals.

  • Ben Macari – Macari’s

We are very happy with making the move to Flipdish. The transition was very smooth and our customers have responded extremely well to our new app.

  • Karl Butler – Mao at Home
sections.faq:
Where can I get my AppID?

You can learn how to get your AppID here on our helpdesk.

How can I sign up to Flipdish?

Please visit our portal at https://portal.flipdish.com/ to sign up to Flipdish or talk to our sales team.

What is the “Space above Basket” setting?

The space above the basket is how far down the page the basket should be from the top of the users screen. This is required for websites that have a sticky header/navigation.

When you visit your menu page with the list of items and you scroll down, the header/navigation sometimes moves down with the page. This will overlap with the ordering basket. If this is happening, please increase the number until the basket is no longer overlapping. If you experience no overlapping at all, please leave it at 0.

How do I add the ordering system to a page?

Once you have entered all the information required and clicked ‘Save Changes’, please click on ‘Copy Shortcode’.

Then, go to the page you wish to add the ordering system to and paste it in the text editor field. In Gutemberg you may have to select the Shortcode block. In other WordPress editors you may also have to select the Shortcode element.

Do you support table ordering?

Yes we do. If you need any assistance you can contact our Customer Support team at https://flipdish.com/ who are available 24/7.

I have problems, who do I contact?

You can visit our help section to see if you can find your answer there https://help.flipdish.com/. Otherwise you can contact our Customer Support team at https://flipdish.com/ who are available 24/7.
sections.changelog:
1.4.16

  • Removed COVID Banners, includes work for new web ordering.

1.4.5

  • Include common issues fixes by default.

1.4.4

  • Fix transparent background not working

1.4.3

  • Fix warning message shown on some sites when saving pages with the ordering system.

  • Refactor the inclusion of external JS & CSS in the shortcode.

1.4.2

  • Display PHP version in plugin settings page.

  • Display plugin version in the front-end.

  • Add system info page for debugging.

1.4.1

  • Fix issue where checking display header & footer on mobile was not working.

  • Compatible with WP version 5.5.1.

1.4.0

  • Display warning message in shortcode if not AppID has been set.

  • Reset plugin version in db on data reset.

  • Fix warning message where no AppID has been set.

  • Fix warning message when no banner has been set.

  • Fix Initial Ordering System Screen not setting to default option.

  • Fix undefined index: fd_portal_id and fd_initial_screen in shortcode.

  • Fix Setting in shortcode working again.

  • On update pre v1.3.0, take on default values for new fields.

  • Compatible with WP version 5.5.

1.3.1

  • Fix issue where activating plugin on a fresh install or updating from pre 1.2.0 would cause a WordPress critical error.

1.3.0

  • Implement WordPress coding standard checks.

  • Fix issue where number 1 is displaying under the ordering system.

  • Flipdish settings separated into individual file per section.

  • Add setting to control initial screen. Ordering options or menu.

  • Add setting to control header and footer display on mobile.

  • Add ability to display covid 19 contactless store banner (multiple regions).

1.2.0

  • Major plugin code refactoring.

  • Displays admin notices when updating settings.

  • Adds support for inernationalization.

  • New way of storing data in options table.

  • Removes plugin data from options table on uninstall.

  • Adds ability to reset plugin data/settings to the default options.

  • Add preview tab in the admin area.

  • Keeps plugin settings pre v1.2.0 on upgrade and removes old db entries.

1.1.3

  • Added support to add Apple Pay domain association file to correct location.

  • Fixed – Warning: Use of undefined constant filpdish_admin_page.

  • Fixed – Warning: Cannot modify header information.

  • Fixed – Warning : Use of undefined constant yes.

  • Fixed – Warning : Use of undefined constant dark.

1.0

  • First release. Plugin created.
